issue.title: [CF 1391] Prot. Paladin Blessed Hammer
issue.body:
When a prot. paladin chooses Blessed Hammer talent, it replaces Hammer of Righteous. 

 

However, TWM does not change Hammer of Righteous automatically. 

 

I tried something like giving "Hammer of Righteous; Blessed Hammer" as the spell to track but it does not work.

 

Is there a method to have a TWM icon which shows Hammer of Righteous or Blessed Hammer depending the talent chosen?

 

Thank you. 


> Posted by CurseForge user BongKim | Imported from CurseForge issue #1391 | Raw

comments.body:
As a note. I quickly tried this and noticed the same issue.

 

However if your replace both of these spells with "Crusader Strike" it seems to work fine.

 

This is probably because crusader strike used to share a cooldown with Hammer of the Righteous.

 

Alternatively you can use Blessed hammer as the first spell in the list and then type Hammer of the Righteous (backwards from what you are doing). That also seems to work.

 

Good luck.


> Posted by CurseForge user bobthegoat2

Thanks for the tip!

 

"Crusader Strike" indeed works as I wanted. It automatically changes TWM icon to Blessed Hammer or Hammer of Righteous depending on the talent I chose.

 

It would have been better if TWM handles Blessed Hammer just like Crusader Strike.

 

Thank you again.


> Posted by CurseForge user BongKim

By the way, "Blessed Hammer; Hammer of Righteous" does not work well because when Blessed Hammer has no charge, its icon suddenly changes to Hammer of Righteous - it's buggy. But "Crusader Strike" just works well.  I hope the next release fixes the bug so that Blessed Hammer behaves just like "Crusader Strike" for prot. paladins.

Edited Mar 11, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user BongKim

Seems fine now in bfa.
